name: soda-pop
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 60 HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 60 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 60 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 60 points.
